actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to make enhancements to the critical access hospital program under the medicare program.
short_title: Critical Access Hospital Enhancement Act of 2000

summary.text: Critical Access Hospital Enhancement Act of 2000 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise requirements for the critical access hospital program with regard to: (1) exemption from bad debt reductions; (2) exemption from payment reductions and the fee schedule for ambulance services; (3) exemption from home health payment limits and the prospective payment system (PPS) for home health services furnished by a home health agency; (4) payment for swing bed services; (5) payment basis for outpatient laboratory tests; and (6) an alternative to the 15-bed limit.

titles.title: Critical Access Hospital Enhancement Act of 2000
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to make enhancements to the critical access hospital program under the medicare program.
